meanings.definition: (biochemistry) Glycerol-3-phosphate acyltransferase. An enzyme that catalyzes the first committed step in glycerolipid synthesis.
meanings.english_definition: An enzyme that catalyzes the first committed step in glycerolipid synthesis.

examples.sentence: GPAT (Glycerol-3-phosphate acyltransferase) is an enzyme involved in glycerolipid synthesis.
examples.translation: GPAT（グリセロール-3-リン酸アシルトランスフェラーゼ）は、グリセロ脂質合成に関与する酵素です。
